Posts.Content: what i was certain was a tumor turned out to be a cyst; i had an ultrasound and aspiration yesterday, and the cyst was filled with blood. from what i have just read on the internet, this is cause for concern despite the fact that it was "just a cyst"....my doctor said nothing about this, just sent me on my way. anyone know anything about this blood-filled issue? thanks.
Posts.Title: blood filled breast cyst
